import React from 'react' import '../componentes/estilos/Badges.css' import logo from '../img/badge-header.svg'; import Navbar from '../componentes/Navbar' import BadgesList from '../componentes/BadgesList'; import pajarito from '../img/gorjeo.png' class Badges extends React.Component { state = { data: [ { id: "2de30c42-9deb-40fc-a41f-05e62b5939a7", nombre: "Freda", apellido: "Grady", email: "Leann_Berge@gmail.com", trabajo: "Legacy Brand Director", titter: "FredaGrady22221-7573", avatarUrl: "https://www.gravatar.com/avatar/f63a9c45aca0e7e7de0782a6b1dff40b?d=identicon", pajarito: "../img/gorjeo.png" }, { id: "d00d3614-101a-44ca-b6c2-0be075aeed3d", nombre: "Major", apellido: "Rodriguez", email: "Ilene66@hotmail.com", trabajo: "Human Research Architect", titter: "ajorRodriguez61545", avatarUrl: "https://www.gravatar.com/avatar/d57a8be8cb9219609905da25d5f3e50a?d=identicon" }, { id: "63c03386-33a2-4512-9ac1-354ad7bec5e9", nombre: "Daphney", apellido: "Torphy", email: "Ron61@hotmail.com", trabajo: "National Markets Officer", titter: "DaphneyTorphy96105", avatarUrl: "https://www.gravatar.com/avatar/e74e87d40e55b9ff9791c78892e55cb7?d=identicon" } ] } render() { return (
New Badge
) } } export default Badges
